title: Pixel 4 XL Android 11 update breaks Netflix Widevine L1
content: After the Android 11 update on Pixel 4 XL, Netflix now shows Widevine L3 so no HD or HDR. This did not happen with a family member's Pixel 3 XL Android 11 update. I have already reinstalled the app and restarted the phone. Does anyone else have this?
